title: Life of the molds
brief_description: The microscope reveals the importance of common place moulds in our daily lives, their impact upon history, and some of the beauty and mystery to be found in the study of these tiny plants. Shows the processes of growth and reproduction, and the complex adaptations of moulds to changing environments.
